column3: Thanks, I'll read it in detail later but such substantial updates to docs are very welcome\n
You can add the translators mailing list as another point of contact https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/bitcoin-translators\n

I'd also like to add a note about translation files being updated periodically (most likely for pre-releases), and code with new translations not requiring any translation file updates in the PR - mostly as it can complicate merges.\n

> You can add the translators mailing list as another point of contact https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/bitcoin-translators

Yes - note that it is already mentioned in README.md, but repeating it here doesn't hurt.
Changes look good to me, ACK, let me know when this is ready for merging.\n
@laanwj I've updated the doc based on feedback. Should be ok to merge.\n
ACK changes. Can you squash your commits?\n
The path has since changed to `src/`. This needs to be updated.\n
I think it would be best to only mention this once under the contact section below , and here refer to that.\n
